title: Talal Chaudhry meets UNAMA Chief, discuss Afghanistan and regional security
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 03 (APP): Minister of State for Interior Talal Chaudhry held an important meeting with Denise Brown, the head of the United Nations Assistance Mission in Afghanistan (UNAMA), on the instructions of Federal Interior Minister Mohsin Naqvi.
The two leaders discussed the situation in Afghanistan, terrorism, and overall regional security.
Talal Chaudhry said that Pakistan has always treated Afghan citizens and other foreigners like brothers. He also stated that under the One Document Regime, Pakistan welcomes people from all over the world.
Denise Brown appreciated Pakistanâ€™s efforts and sacrifices in the fight against terrorism.
